meta.hint:
A prefix can be added to the beginning of a word to make a new word. example re+do = redo
A suffix can be added to the end of a word to make a new word. example help+ful = helpful
The prefix re- means again.
The prefix un- means not or the opposite of.
The suffix -ful means full of.
The suffix -less means without.
meta.question: Complete the sentence with the right suffix.

content.description: The room was sound_____. The room was without sound.
That painting is color_____. That painting is so full of colors.
I like seed_____ oranges. I like oranges without seed.
We must  __start the game. We must start the game again.
That girl was __kind to me. That girl was not kind to me.
